text:
Thanks to @BritishMuslimTV & @mshafiquk for inviting me to speak about #COVID19 & British Muslims

Highlighting work of @DOTW_UK, @BritishIMA and discussing the findings from the recent @MuslimCensus

Reinforcing key messages that the #vaccine is safe to have in #Ramadan https://t.co/EcVxzAWSWv https://t.co/m0pRnsP0Yx
